title: @Riot Suggested user QoL Idea - Item Sets
body:
Riot, I just thought of a small idea that would be somewhat useful to a lot (if not nearly all) of League players.
Item sets should tied in with the user account, not with the computer/instant of the program of LoL they are running. 
This would be useful to players who:
1. Are using their account on a different computer/new computer to what they normally use
and 2. Have had to re-install LoL on their computer for whatever reason.
 (As their are already enough settings users have to change when they re-install. Maybe user account settings could be kept with the users account to?)\


Thank You for reading and I hope the guys at Riot see this :)

replies.body: The reason I think they don't do this is because they would have to store it on their servers which would mean that it's more data they have to maintain. Although it would be convenient :P
